mapper.select:
SELECT s.*, b.`name` AS bname, s.brand_id as brandId, s.sub_title as subTitle, s.create_time as createTime, CONCAT_WS('/', (select c.`name` from tb_category c where s.cid1=c.id), (select c.`name` from tb_category c where s.cid2=c.id), (select c.`name` from tb_category c where s.cid3=c.id) )as cname
FROM tb_spu s, tb_brand b
s.brand_id = b.id and s.valid=1
and s.title like '%${key}%'
and s.saleable=#{saleable}
